mapper.select: SELECT cr.*, f.file_url, u.name FROM class_review cr LEFT JOIN user u ON cr.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN file f ON u.file_no = f.file_no WHERE cr.class_id = #{classId}
SELECT ci.*, f.file_url as fileUrl FROM class_introduce ci LEFT JOIN file f ON ci.file_no = f.file_no WHERE ci.class_id = #{classId}

SELECT p.*, u.name, COUNT(c.comment_id) AS commentCount FROM community_post p LEFT JOIN community_comment c ON p.post_id = c.post_id LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.class_id = #{class_id} GROUP BY p.post_id
mapper.insert: insert into class_review (user_id, class_id, rating, content, created_at) values(#{review.userId},#{review.classId},#{review.rating},#{review.content},now())
